        public javax.swing.Icon loadIcon(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an icon by the specified name, and, if it hasn't been loaded already, loads it from file.

        Returns:

      • loadIcon

        public void loadIcon(java.lang.String name,
                     java.io.File file)
        Loads an icon at a specified location, but saves it as only name.

        Should only be used by the plugin loader.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the file that will be referenced later
        file - The file where the image is stored. The image should be EXACTLY GameConstants.ICON_SIZE in both directions

      • composite

        public javax.swing.Icon composite(java.util.List<Visible> visibles)
        Parameters:
        visibles - A list of visibles, to be rendered in order of z-index.
        Returns:
        An icon that represents
